title: where's the dashboard when spectating games
body: So i noticed when i spectate ranked games, there was no dashboard showing players items and kills anymore. is it removed or its just my settings are not right?

replies.body: I believe you can turn it off/on by pressing either TAB or O (same as you would in game) but I'm not 100% sure. I know there is a toggle for it I just don't remember exactly what key it is. If neither of those work lemme know and I'll have a poke around for you.
